body: This Friday I am going to National Academic Games, which is in Orlando Florida. I am just wondering if you have heard of it and if you have can you tell me if you're going?

title: National Academic Games

replies.body:
Ye, I've heard of it mate. I live just 30 minutes away from Orlando. 
Just wish I was smart enough for that stuff lol.
